 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּלְפִיּוֺת‎</span> **noun feminine plural** [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] (in [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]) ***exitialia, fatal things*** (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלף‎</span> = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perish***); — poet for ***weapons***; many other conjectures in Commentaries: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּ מִגְדַּל דָּוִיד צַוָּאדֵךְ בָּנוּי לְת‎</span> [[Song.4.4|Song 4:4]] a, doubtful; [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Expos. Times, ix. 423: JQ, July 1899, 562</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָטִים‎</span> ***shields***, compare v<sup>b</sup>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַשָּׁר‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַאשָּׁר‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּלְתַּלִּים‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלל‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֻּמָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמם‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּמָא‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּימָא‎</span>
